name: Abdulrahman Amr
summary: Detail-oriented, organized, and meticulous employee. Works at a fast pace to meet tight deadlines. Enthusiastic team player ready to contribute to company success.

responsibilities: Developed scalable and maintainable code, ensuring long-term stability of the software.
Developed reusable components that significantly reduced development effort on multiple projects.
Led a remote team in developing four innovative mobile apps using Flutter and Node.js.

projects.name: JAMALA (E-Commerce App)
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce mobile application built with Flutter, featuring seamless shopping experience with Firebase backend integration, user authentication, advanced search functionality, and favorites management.

projects.name: ADDUSTOUR (News App)
projects.description: A modern news application providing real-time updates with push notifications, user authentication, WebView integration for articles, SQL database for offline reading, and advanced search filters.

projects.name: SADAD (Financial App)
projects.description: A robust financial management application with comprehensive features including real-time notifications, multi-printer support for receipts, seamless sharing capabilities, and powerful search functionality.

projects.name: Pack and Go (Real Estate App)
projects.description: A feature-rich real estate application enabling users to browse properties, manage listings, and connect with real estate professionals. Built with team collaboration using Git workflows.

projects.name: ALBASHEQ (Financial App)
projects.description: An advanced financial application with comprehensive features including notifications, multi-printer support, sharing capabilities, search functionality, dual theme support, and integrated advertising.

projects.name: Golden Mark (Financial App)
projects.description: A professional financial management solution featuring real-time notifications, multi-printer support for documentation, seamless sharing, and powerful search capabilities for financial records.

projects.name: Car Washing App
projects.description: A convenient car washing service application that connects users with service providers. Features include user authentication, booking management, and team collaboration using Git workflows.
